hack a satellite.[/bq]
But where would you get a axe that big?
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/533091e26368725179050000#post_533091e26368725179050000

!http://cdn.themetapicture.com/media/funny-lumberjack-big-axe.jpg!
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc

topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/533094eb6368722dbb180000#post_533094eb6368722dbb180000
I never wanted to be a satellite technician; I wanted to be... a lumberjack!

Leaping from tree to tree, as they float down the mighty rivers of British Columbia.  The giant redwood.  The larch.  The fir!  The mighty scots pine!*...*
With my best buddy by my side, we'd sing!  Sing! Sing!
I'm a lumberjack, and I'm okay.
I sleep all night and I work all day.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
